verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Also, thou <S%H859><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> unto the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> An end, <S%H7093><s%> the end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H3671><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> is the end <S%H7093><s%> come upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and I will send <S%H7971><s%> mine anger <S%H639><s%> upon thee, and will judge <S%H8199><s%> thee according to thy ways, <S%H1870><s%> and will recompense <S%H5414><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thine abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

And mine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> spare <S%H2347><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, neither <S%H3808><s%> will I have pity: <S%H2550><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> I will recompense <S%H5414><s%> thy ways <S%H1870><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and thine abominations <S%H8441><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> An evil, <S%H7451><s%> an only <S%H259><s%> evil, <S%H7451><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> is come. <S%H935><s%>
An end <S%H7093><s%> is come, <S%H935><s%> the end <S%H7093><s%> is come: <S%H935><s%> it watcheth <S%H6974><s%> for <S%H413><s%> thee; behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is come. <S%H935><s%>

The morning <S%H6843><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, O thou that dwellest <S%H3427><s%> in the land: <S%H776><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> is come, <S%H935><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H4103><s%> is near, <S%H7138><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> the sounding again <S%H1906><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> will I shortly <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7138><s%> pour out <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and accomplish <S%H3615><s%> mine anger <S%H639><s%> upon thee: and I will judge <S%H8199><s%> thee according to thy ways, <S%H1870><s%> and will recompense <S%H5414><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee for <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thine abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

And mine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> spare, <S%H2347><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I have pity: <S%H2550><s%> I will recompense <S%H5414><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee according to thy ways <S%H1870><s%> and thine abominations <S%H8441><s%> that are <S%H1961><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that smiteth. <S%H5221><s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> the day, <S%H3117><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is come: <S%H935><s%> the morning <S%H6843><s%> is gone forth; <S%H3318><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> hath blossomed, <S%H6692><s%> pride <S%H2087><s%> hath budded. <S%H6524><s%>

Violence <S%H2555><s%> is risen up <S%H6965><s%> into a rod <S%H4294><s%> of wickedness: <S%H7562><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them shall remain, nor <S%H3808><s%> of their multitude, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1995><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> of any of theirs: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1991><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall there be wailing <S%H5089><s%> for them.

The time <S%H6256><s%> is come, <S%H935><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> draweth near: <S%H5060><s%> let not <S%H408><s%> the buyer <S%H7069><s%> rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> the seller <S%H4376><s%> mourn: <S%H56><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> wrath <S%H2740><s%> is upon <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the multitude <S%H1995><s%> thereof.

For <S%H3588><s%> the seller <S%H4376><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H413><s%> that which is sold, <S%H4465><s%> although they were yet <S%H5750><s%> alive: <S%H2416><s%> <S%H2416><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the vision <S%H2377><s%> is touching <S%H413><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> multitude <S%H1995><s%> thereof, which shall not <S%H3808><s%> return; <S%H7725><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall any <S%H376><s%> strengthen himself <S%H2388><s%> in the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his life. <S%H2416><s%>

They have blown <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet, <S%H8619><s%> even to make all ready; <S%H3559><s%> <S%H3605><s%> but none <S%H369><s%> goeth <S%H1980><s%> to the battle: <S%H4421><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> my wrath <S%H2740><s%> is upon <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the multitude <S%H1995><s%> thereof.

The sword <S%H2719><s%> is without, <S%H2351><s%> and the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and the famine <S%H7458><s%> within: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> he that <S%H834><s%> is in the field <S%H7704><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> with the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and he that <S%H834><s%> is in the city, <S%H5892><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> and pestilence <S%H1698><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> him.

But they that escape <S%H6403><s%> of them shall escape, <S%H6412><s%> and shall be <S%H1961><s%> on <S%H413><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> like doves <S%H3123><s%> of the valleys, <S%H1516><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them mourning, <S%H1993><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> for his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be feeble, <S%H7503><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> knees <S%H1290><s%> shall be weak <S%H1980><s%> as water. <S%H4325><s%>

They shall also gird <S%H2296><s%> themselves with sackcloth, <S%H8242><s%> and horror <S%H6427><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> them; and shame <S%H955><s%> shall be upon <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> faces, <S%H6440><s%> and baldness <S%H7144><s%> upon all <S%H3605><s%> their heads. <S%H7218><s%>

They shall cast <S%H7993><s%> their silver <S%H3701><s%> in the streets, <S%H2351><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> removed: <S%H5079><s%> their silver <S%H3701><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be able <S%H3201><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the wrath <S%H5678><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> satisfy <S%H7646><s%> their souls, <S%H5315><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> fill <S%H4390><s%> their bowels: <S%H4578><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it is <S%H1961><s%> the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

As for the beauty <S%H6643><s%> of his ornament, <S%H5716><s%> he set <S%H7760><s%> it in majesty: <S%H1347><s%> but they made <S%H6213><s%> the images <S%H6754><s%> of their abominations <S%H8441><s%> and of their detestable things <S%H8251><s%> therein: therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I set <S%H5414><s%> it far <S%H5079><s%> from them.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> it into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the strangers <S%H2114><s%> for a prey, <S%H957><s%> and to the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for a spoil; <S%H7998><s%> and they shall pollute <S%H2490><s%> it.

My face <S%H6440><s%> will I turn <S%H5437><s%> also from <S%H4480><s%> them, and they shall pollute <S%H2490><s%> <S%H853><s%> my secret <S%H6845><s%> place: for the robbers <S%H6530><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into it, and defile <S%H2490><s%> it.

Make <S%H6213><s%> a chain: <S%H7569><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of bloody <S%H1818><s%> crimes, <S%H4941><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of violence. <S%H2555><s%>

Wherefore I will bring <S%H935><s%> the worst <S%H7451><s%> of the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> their houses: <S%H1004><s%> I will also make the pomp <S%H1347><s%> of the strong <S%H5794><s%> to cease; <S%H7673><s%> and their holy places <S%H4720><s%> shall be defiled. <S%H2490><s%>
Destruction <S%H7089><s%> cometh; <S%H935><s%> and they shall seek <S%H1245><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> and there shall be none. <S%H369><s%>

Mischief <S%H1943><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> mischief, <S%H1943><s%> and rumor <S%H8052><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> rumor; <S%H8052><s%> then shall they seek <S%H1245><s%> a vision <S%H2377><s%> of the prophet; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5030><s%> but the law <S%H8451><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%> from the priest, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3548><s%> and counsel <S%H6098><s%> from the ancients. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2205><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> shall mourn, <S%H56><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with desolation, <S%H8077><s%> and the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall be troubled: <S%H926><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> unto them after their way, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> and according to their deserts <S%H4941><s%> will I judge <S%H8199><s%> them; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
